meanings.definition: Resembling a gnat in size or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The tiny insect had a gnatlike appearance.
meanings.sent2: The gnatlike creature buzzed around the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The gnatlike mosquito tried to act tough but was just too small.
meanings.sent4: Her gnatlike voice barely reached the back of the room.
meanings.sent5: The gnatlike wings fluttered rapidly, barely visible to the eye.

meanings.sent1: The gnatlike problem seemed trivial at first.
meanings.sent2: His gnatlike complaints were often overlooked.
meanings.sent3: The gnatlike pebble in his shoe caused more frustration than expected.
meanings.sent4: The gnatlike details were easily missed in the grand scheme of things.
meanings.sent5: Her gnatlike presence in the meeting went unnoticed by most.
